_header: Saint Margaret the holy maid and good
Subjects: saints’ lives; Margaret, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Margaret in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynt Margarete was holi maide & goodIbore heo was in antioch
                    Icome of kunde blod…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou seynt Margarete þat holi maide we biddeþ aten
                    endeþat þu bidde uor ous þat we mote to þe Ioie of
                    heuene wende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Margarete was an holi Maide and goodI bore heo was in
                    Antioche i come of kuynde blod…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Hire bodi was buried in Assye hire soule wende to heuene
                    blisseNou God for þe loue of seinte Margarete ne let vs neuere
                    þerof misse Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Margarete was holy mayden & goedI bore she was in
                    Antioche y come of heye blod…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now seint Margaret þat holi maide we biddeþ atte
                    nendeÞat þi bidde for vs þat we mote to þe Ioye of
                    heuen wende
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines: ffaste he [ ]He sparid for no don[ ]…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines: …[ ]ihesu crist I be leve[ ] þe fend of helle

OxfCCC237.First Lines:
Seynt margret whas an holy mayde and a goodeberne sche was in
                    Antyoche & come of kngys blode…
OxfCCC237.Last Lines:
…And þat we may at doomys dayCome to þat blysse
                    þat lastys ayAmen amen ffor charyte
OxfCCC237.Note:
First six lines written as prose; thereafter written as if four-line
                    stanzas abcb in two columns and finally as long-line couplets in single
                    column.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne Margarete þat was þe haly maiden & godeBorne
                    sho was in Antioche & comen of gentil blodeTheodose hir fadre hight a
                    grete lordeȝ in his dagheȝPatriarche he was also & maistre of
                    þe lagheȝ…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Sayne margarete þou maiden suete we pray þe here our
                    steueneour bale þou bete & bryng vs vnto þe blis of
                    heuene

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seinte margarete was holy maide and godI bore he was in antioche
                    icome of kunde blod…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou seinte Margarete þe holy maide we biddeþ atte
                    nendeþat þou bidde for us þat we mote to þe ioie of
                    heuene wende

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Margarete an holy mayde was and goedYbore ȝeo was in
                    Antioche and ycome of gret blod…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
… Now Seint Margarete þe holy mayde we þe biddeþ
                    atten endeÞat Þou bidde ffor vs þat we mote to þe ioye
                    of heuene wende

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint margaret þe holy mayde & goudeI bore heo was in
                    auntyoche ycome of hey blode…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…hire body was buryd in asye hire saule wende to blysseNow god
                    for þe loue of hire ne late ous þer of mysse

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEinte Margarete was holy Mayde and gody bore ȝo was in
                    antyoche ycome of kunde blod…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou Seinte Margarete þe holy maide we praiþ atte
                    nendeþat þou pray for vs þat we mote to þe Ioye of
                    heuene wende
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancta Margareta (f. 126, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Margareta (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Margarete was holi maide & godibore heo was in antioche icome of kende blod…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou sein mergrete þat holi maide we biddeþ at endeþat þu bidde for ous þat we mote to þe ioie of heuen wende
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xlix” added to left margin by later hand (f. 101v).

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Margarete was holi maide & godBoren heo was in antioche & come of heiȝe blod…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now seint Margarete we biddeþ þe ate nendeBide vor vs þat we mote to þe ioie of heuene wende

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt Margarete was holi maide & godIbore ȝe was in antioche ycome of kunde blod…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou seinte margarete þat holi maide we biddiþ þe atte nendebide for vs þat we mote to þe ioye of heuene wende

BLEge2891.First Lines: …Olybring sat and biheld hou hure lymes ourne ablodeHe ne miȝte for deol it iseo ne monie þat þer stode…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …þer come men wel ofte þer uorþ and þis fur iseie þereAnd sede it ne miȝte noȝt beo þat þare gret tresor nere…
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: Begins incomplete due to missing folio or folios between 106 and 107, and ends incomplete due to missing folio or folios between 107 and 108.

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Margarete was holi maide & godIbore heo was in Antioche icome of cunde blod…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou Seinte Margarete þat holi maide we biddeþ atten endeVat heo bidde for ous þat we mote to þe ioye of heuene wende

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Margarete was a holy mayde & godeBorn she was in Antioche
                    comen of kynde blode…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…She was biryed in Asye hir soule went to blisseNow god for
                    þe love of hir ne lete vs þerof mysse Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Margarete þe virgyne was holy maid and goodBorn she was
                    in Antioche and commen of kynggis blood…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Seynt Margarete þe holy maide we prey þe at þe
                    endePrey for vs þat we mote to þe Ioye of heuene wende.
                    Amen.
